name: Tallyfy, Inc.
description: Developer of a cloud-based workflow automation software designed to track and improve recurring workflows in real-time. The company's software specializes in client onboarding, customer success, business process management, workflow, process improvement, and compliance, enabling businesses to prevent human errors and streamline their processes.
